name: Mitigation Playbook for Command-Line Interface Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker leveraged command-line interfaces to execute scripts, deploy malware, and exfiltrate sensitive data. The playbook includes actions to terminate malicious processes, clean up scripts, and perform security scans.

action--f75bb39b-e228-487c-aa36-7bb4b5cb.name: Kill malicious process
action--f75bb39b-e228-487c-aa36-7bb4b5cb.description: Terminate any processes associated with the malicious script.

if-condition--4f6e31cf-d9a4-4f6f-b28c-70.name: Check if malicious process is still running
if-condition--4f6e31cf-d9a4-4f6f-b28c-70.description: Check if the process is still active.

action--4f6e31cf-d9a4-4f6f-b28c-70a93d91.name: Remove malicious scripts
action--4f6e31cf-d9a4-4f6f-b28c-70a93d91.description: Delete the suspicious script files from the disk.

action--a78d7f18-54a8-477b-b921-b4e803a8.name: Run endpoint scan
action--a78d7f18-54a8-477b-b921-b4e803a8.description: Perform an endpoint security scan to check for any remaining threats.

while-condition--scan_check.name: Scan Status Check
while-condition--scan_check.description: Repeat the scan until a clean status is confirmed.

process_still_running.description: Indicates if any malicious scripts are still running
